action.textblock: Notice of environmental assessment and request for comments.

summary.textblock: The National Science Foundation (NSF) has prepared an Environmental Assessment of the United States Antarctic Program's Management of Food Wastes at McMurdo Station, Antarctica, from 1993-1996. NSF is inviting public comments on the Environmental Assessment. In order to be assured consideration, comments must be received no later than February 4, 1994.

address.textblock: Copies of the Environmental Assessment may be obtained from and comments addressed to Thomas F. Forhan, Head, Antarctic Staff, Polar Coordination and Information Section, Office of Polar Programs, National Science Foundation, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, room 755, Arlington, Virginia 22230.
